title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system. It stores structured data, supports SQL queries, and offers reliability, scalability, and ACID compliance for various applications and websites.It stores structured data

title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C programming is a foundational, efficient language developed in the 1970s. It's valued for its portability and system-level capabilities, making it crucial for diverse software, including operating systems and embedded systems.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithms are step-by-step instructions for solving problems. They play a fundamental role in computer science, guiding processes from data sorting to problem-solving in various applications.They play a fundamental role in computer science

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is a powerful programming language extensively used in DSA. Its versatility and efficiency aid in designing and implementing various data structures and algorithms,Its versatility and efficiency

title: Software Engineering
description: It's a systematic approach to designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems. It employs principles and methods to ensure reliable, efficient, and high-quality software solutions.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: A fundamental cognitive process involving analyzing, devising solutions, and implementing them to overcome challenges or achieve goals, central to various fields, including mathematics, science, and engineering.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python emphasizes organizing code into reusable objects, enhancing modularity, and promoting concepts like classes, inheritance, and encapsulation

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a leading cloud computing platform, offering a range of services such as storage, computing, databases, and more, enabling scalable and flexible cloud solutions.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Fundamental elements like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues used in computer science to organize and store data efficiently,essential for algorithm implementation  essential for algorithm implementation and problem-solving.
